name: 1 Million Royal Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Citrus & Woods..Key Notes: Lavender, Cedar Wood, Benzoin..Fragrance Description: This is a flamboyant, fresh, woody blend that empowers you to claim the stage. Youu2019re the king. Itu2019s time to riseu2014with One Million Royal...About the Bottle: This bottle is designed for defiant self-expression and success; the iconic One Million gold bar gets updated for Royal. Confidence meets craftsmanship via accents of fearless red that echo jewels and royal insignias. Not merely a bottle, but a call to actionu2014it dares you to defy the playbook of convention and live life your way...About the Fragrance: The legend is reborn with an unexpected blend of energizing lavender, vibrant cedarwood, and sensual benzoin, for a fragrance thatu2019s as defiant as you. A flamboyant, fresh, woody blend that collides with a distinctive sensuality to unleash what makes you uniquely you.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Coumarin, Citronellol, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Alcohol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_title: It's in the name... Smell Royal !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance has become a staple in my collection and here's why:   Scent - The fragrance opens beautifully with notes of vanilla and cedar wood, which is sophisticated and creates an overall vibrant scent that will get you compliments. I love how sweet and warm the scent exudes.  Longevity - I usually apply this in the morning before work, and by the evening, subtle traces of the scent still lingers on my skin. I'd say I roughly get 12 hours of this. So, it has a pretty impressive longevity!  Packaging - The bottle itself is pretty iconic and the detail of the red ruby adds a fun new take on the original. It's definitely a bottle that will stand out on your shelf. Versatility - It easily suits most seasons, especially between fall and winter. Also, whether it's day or night, this fragrance shines.   Overall, Paco Rabanne has nailed this by blending sophistication, longevity, and versatility in a bottle. It's definitely a step up from the original. So if you're looking for a unique, clean scent then I highly recommend this to anyone (unisex)!

reviews.review_title: Makes you smell like a Million bucks! ud83dudcb8
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First thoughts : WOAH, this is way better than Iu2019ve anticipated. I like the smell way more than I thought I was going to. This is an Aromatic sweet Woody & Smoky version of One Million EDT. In the opening, you get a strong aromatic Cardamom, mixed with the Bergamot & Tangerine creating this sweet citrusy smell. After about half an hour, the Woody notes and the Violet leaves starts to synchronize together in perfect harmony. This is so well blended. Iu2019m a perfumer myself so I can tell easily how certain ingredients were blended. This fragrance contains Benzoin in the base, and every perfumer knows that Benzoin is very hard to deal with, if too much is added, the concentration becomes too sticky and thus prevents the aroma chemicals from bouncing off the skin as well as it needs to, causing the fragrance projection & performance to plummet. However,  1 Million Royale performs really well & projects really well. My wife seems to like it a lot on me & sheu2019s complimented me twice on it already! Definitely would purchase this myself, but thanks to Influenster, I got this bottle for free!   *Disclaimer: I received this product for free from Insfluenster and Paco Rabanne in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Exquisite Scent and Packaging: A Fragrance to Reme
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne's 1 Million Royal Parfum is a fragrance that truly stands out in a sea of options. Right from the beginning, it leaves a lasting impression. Let's begin with the packaging, which is sleek and stylish. The iconic One Million gold bar with bold red accents gives it a modern look that sets the stage for the exciting journey to come.  The fragrance itself is a delightful composition. It opens with a unique note of pink bubblegum, followed by a pleasant blend of cardamom, lavender, sage, violet leaf, and a base that includes benzoin, cedar, and patchouli. This mixture strikes a balance between sweetness and freshness, making it suitable for a wide range of occasions.  What impressed me the most about 1 Million Royal Parfum is its longevity. Just a single spray on my wrist held up remarkably well, lasting a solid 9-10 hours. It's the kind of fragrance that stays with you throughout the day or night, ensuring you always smell your best.  In terms of versatility, this fragrance has a broad appeal. It leans towards the masculine side but maintains a youthful and energetic character. Whether you're heading out for a night of clubbing or a special date, it's a reliable choice that exudes confidence. The bottle design adds to the overall experience and comes across as chic and premium.  In conclusion, Paco Rabanne's 1 Million Royal Parfum is a fantastic addition to the world of fragrances. Its unique blend, long-lasting nature, and attractive packaging make it a standout choice. If you're looking for a positive and energetic scent that will keep you smelling great all day, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's a confident and stylish fragrance that won't disappoint.

1 Million Royal is the perfect winter cologne. It's sweet with a strong cedar wood kick but not too overpowering. It's like a fancier version of the original 1 Million, great for formal events. Lasts all day, over 8 hours on my skin, and it's not as sweet as the original, which I like. Perfect for winter vibes!

reviews.review_text: 1 million royal is like the original but more intense, detailed, high quality than the original 1 million. Itu2019s worth if you want a formal scent thatu2019s sweet and has the 1 million dna  The opening notes are fresh and vibrant, with a hint of citrus and green apple, which immediately captures your attention. As the fragrance evolves, the heart notes of spicy cinnamon and warm, sweet tobacco create an alluring aura. The base notes of amber and leather add a rich and long-lasting depth to the scent. It also lasts over 12 hours on my skin and projects well for first 4 hours. It opens up fresh and sweet. The dry down is sweet and slightly spicy.

Itu2019s not as cloying, as bubbly, or as sweet as the original. It has its own defined character. Itu2019s sweet, but sharp. It lingers, but doesnu2019t overwhelm.  The longevity on my skin is great - 8+ hours.  On fabric and clothing 12+.   Sillage is great too. Itu2019s not a beast, but you will turn heads.  Love wearing this, especially as cold weather approaches

reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal is a luxurious fragrance with a captivating scent, but itu2019s not for everyone, given its strong initial projection and premium cost. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is phenomenal, with a warm and woody fragrance that lasts forever. Since itu2019s a parfum it smells great when you first put it on, without having the alcohol smell that some cheaper eau de toilettes have. It also means it lasts longer on your skin, still smelling great at the end of the day. The smell also uniquely shifts throughout the day, highlighting specific notes as it starts to fade, starting off with a citrussy smell, then highlighting lavender middle notes, then finally rounding out the day with an everlasting woody masculine scent. My partner is obsessed with this scent, along with various people who have given me compliments while I was wearing it. Paco packages this cologne in a gorgeous bottle that is made of real metal and is inset with a shimmering jewel to differentiate it from the regular Million scents (which are still great). This is definitely a must-buy fragrance for anyone who loves Pacou2019s scents but wants something new and unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great amber, spicy, and very sweet frag that is heavy on the cardamom notes! Great for evenings and colder weather. Enjoyable, but very focused on doing one thing - and that is smelling like sweet cardamom.

Sweet, sweet, some spice, and.... fresh! Let's start with what's obvious. There's a resinous sweetness that permeates this fragrance. Not uncommon, but I'm glad they didn't go with a in-your-face vanilla and enjoy the choice here. I think some of the critique by many is misplaced here; Paco Rabanne stayed true to their identity with this loud yet sophisticated choice of sweetness (which btw is still less cloyingly sweet than it's competitors). Now, interestingly, this fragrance has a lot of freshness to it (perhaps the citrus dancing with the lavender and violet leaf) which lends it some added versatility over its designer competition. This is the feature that sets it apart imo. I get no amber in this and it's not overtly a woody fragranace to me, but there is that detectable cardamom note off the top that I wish was more pronounced. It's settles into a much more tame yet still fresh resinous sweetness.   It's performance is okay (a bit overstated imo). It projects for around 2 hours, then a skin scent for up to maybe 6 hours. Definitely weaker than 1 Million Parfum or Elixir imo.   Now to the downsides. Well, it's a pricey flanker. Although I've owned it for some time, I don't see myself reaching to it any more than other fragrances of this genre. When I say genre, I don't mean the same fragrance DNA, but the same use-case / time of day / season. Sometimes I'll want to grab Armani SWY, sometimes Azzaro's The Most Wanted or the new Invictus Victory Elixir. So in essence, it hasn't convinced me to pick it over others. Had there been a more distinct spice (amp up the cardamom!!) or woodsier undertone, may that could have done it. Also, maybe I need to see an ENT but I hardly pick up any type of amber here (and this is what I was most excited for).  Still a solid 4/5. A proven DNA with a nice freshness that others lack. They played it safe to the point of unoriginal, but it's a compliment getter for sure.  PS: Excited for 1 Million Golden Oud!!

Iu2019ve been using this perfume for over a month now and I love the sweet woody smell of it! Definitely a compliment magnet! Also love the ruby red on the front of the bottle. Seems to me like itu2019s the nature version of the original 1 million perfume.

Love the scent of this cologne . The entire million line is great for every day use . Would definitely recommend! Wife is picky with strong dented cologne and she finds this perfect for the daily use .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sure, here's a more detailed review for Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal:  Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal is an absolute gem in the fragrance world! It exudes opulence and sophistication with its captivating blend of warm spices and woody accords. The opening notes of cinnamon and nutmeg instantly grab your attention, creating a spicy and inviting aura. As the fragrance settles, you'll notice the smooth and creamy undertones of tonka bean and sandalwood, adding a touch of elegance and depth.  What sets 1 Million Royal apart is its ability to strike the perfect balance between boldness and refinement. It's a fragrance that commands attention without overpowering the senses. The longevity is impressive, with the scent lingering on your skin for hours, making it ideal for special events or memorable evenings. I have worn this to several weddings recently and been complemented each time!  The bottle itself is a work of art, adorned with a golden crown, symbolizing the regal nature of the fragrance. It's a true statement piece that reflects the essence of the scent within.  Overall, Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal is a masterpiece that embodies luxury and allure. It's a fragrance that will leave a lasting impression wherever you go, making you feel like a true king.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The opening is very sweet, citric, and cardamom-heavy, and benzoin and lavender join the cardamom on the drydown. Its longevity is great, and it easily lasts 12+ hours on my skin. While its sillage and projection are not crazy, it does leave noticeable trails. Ultimately, 1 Million Royal isn't very unique among some similar releases this year, but I would call it a safe crowd pleaser. In terms of the bottle itself - although I'm personally not a huge fan of the design, the atomizer is quite nice.

That being said, when this goes on sale, make sure to grab two, you are going to find yourself loving to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of experiencing a woody fragrance for men that has left an indelible mark on my senses. 1 Million Royal is the embodiment of timeless elegance and sophistication.  Upon the first spray, I was greeted with a warm, inviting blend of rich woods and spices. The top notes of cedarwood and spicy cardamom create an immediate aura of confidence and masculinity. It's a scent that demands attention without being overpowering.  As 1 Million Royal settles on the skin, the heart notes unfold with a harmonious mix of leather and patchouli. This stage of the fragrance exudes a refined sensuality, making it equally suitable for both formal occasions and everyday wear. It's a scent that exudes confidence and charm.  One of the standout features of 1 Million Royal is its remarkable longevity. A single application in the morning remains detectable well into the evening, ensuring that you carry its allure with you throughout the day. The sillage is just rightu2014not too intense, but enough to leave a lasting impression.  The bottle itself is a work of art, a testament to the attention to detail that went into crafting this fragrance. Its sleek design and sturdy cap make it a pleasure to display on any dresser.  In conclusion, this perfume is a masterpiece in the world of woody fragrances for men. It strikes the perfect balance between strength and subtlety, making it a versatile addition to any collection. If you're in search of a fragrance that exudes sophistication and leaves a lasting impact, [Fragrance Name] should be at the top of your list. It's a timeless scent that will undoubtedly become a signature fragrance for many discerning gentlemen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1 Million Royal by Paco Rabbanne is a juicy blast, lasting 6 hours and being easy to wear. When 1 Million Royal is first sprayed, I pick up notes of stewed fruits, orange, melon, and fruity chewing gum. Although It is a very fruity and sweet opening, I find it presents those notes in a masculine way. In the dry down, this fragrance retains the fruitiness found in the opening but it loses its sharpness. I pick up a hints of wood as well as vanilla at this point. Still, the fruitiness is what dominates. Other than the hints I pick up in the dry down, I find its smell to be rather linear. Nevertheless, it has good sillage. It last me a day with five sprays. Iu2019m reminded of Jean Paul Gaultieru2019s Ultra mu00e2le because of its sweet and vanillic character. If I had to choose between the two, I would choose One Million Royal due to it not being so overwhelming. It is definitely a crowd pleasing scent. Perhaps not a great choice for the office, though. The bottles design is cool with its integrated sprayer. It sits in the palm of your hand nicely and is easy to apply. personally wouldnu2019t pay retail price for this fragrance. I find the price to be too high for the product youu2019re getting. If you like fruity notes in your fragrances, and it can be bought at a good discount, consider giving One Million Royal by Paco Rabbane a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Paco Robanne in exchange for my honest review. This is also my personal opinion and I did my best to leave as thorough of a review as possible.  1 Million Royal is the most well refined out of Paco Robanneu2019s iconic 1 Million line. Although sharing the same DNA as itu2019s successors, this has been elevated into a more sophisticated scent, but still maintaining a sexy playfulness to it. This doesnu2019t come across as juvenile, or overly sweet as the others. Itu2019s sweetness is nicely balanced, blended smoothly with a touch of freshness that compliments it.  1 Million Royal opens with with a smooth vanilla accord. Which is interesting as itu2019s not listed in the scent profile, most likely coming from the Benzoin in combination with Cardamom, adding a slightly  spicy creaminess. I also notice some juicy citrus - adding a touch of refreshing sweetness from the Bergamot and Tangerine. In the beginning of the dry down is where I notice some added complexity and balance to the otherwise warm scent, coming from Lavender - creating a layer of aromatic, green, fresh spiciness and Violet Leaf  - that has a herbal ozonic quality - almost reminiscent of cucumber. Towards the end of the dry down the Cedar, Sage, and Patchouli start to become peak through, I wish they came sooner and were a bit more prominent, but Iu2019m glad theyu2019re in the room with us! I love the mildly peppery aspects and savouriness from the sage, and the Patchouli smelling rich, dark, sweet and earthy in combination with the smooth woody profile of the cedar. At the very least Iu2019d recommend testing this in store to see if you like this, itu2019s a great Winter fragrance, and mass appealing. This has really great longevity (8-10 hours) and pretty monster silage compared to other releases from this line. As per the packaging - I love the bottle! Itu2019s over the top, but feels well made and not like a piece of junk thatu2019ll fall apart. Plus the atomizer is great. Thanks Paco Roba

Received my box as part of a promotion in exchange for this review - however Iu2019m going to give you my honest thoughts as a perfume collector.   First, this is competing against other designer scents. It has a very designer DNA to it, so this review will consider it vs others in that category.   The bergamot, lavender, cedar notes give it a surprisingly fresh quality. I was expecting it to be heavier like the original. That freshness is one youu2019ll recognize and it may smell u201cgenericu201d to you. The cardamom & benzoin hold it down from being a blue scent and keep it a red. Itu2019s sweet but not overly sweet like other reviews suggest.   This is best suited for men 18-35, any temperature except high heat. Performance is satisfactory, not a powerhouse.   Overall itu2019s a u201cgoodu201d sweet/fresh designer scent. Nothing offensive,  nothing revolutionary. Hard to dislike, but not a head tuner. 4/5.

I would consider this a cooler weather fragrance, for day or night, in a casual setting.  Seems like a lot of people love most of the 1 Million line, but so far, none have worked for me. Other than Ultra Red, I struggle to find any Paco Rabanne fragrances that are personally wearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 1 Million Royal by Paco Rabanne initiates with an invitingly sweet and warm allure, evoking images of golden honey interwoven with spicy undertones. As the scent unfolds, it reveals unexpected aromatic heart notes, specifically lavender and possibly violet. For many, this might add depth, but for me, it became a headache trigger amidst an otherwise oriental-spicy blend.  The dry down reverts to the enveloping warmth, demonstrating both longevity and moderate sillage. It's a fragrance that stands out, and while many would find its contrasting notes intriguing, those sensitive to particular florals should tread lightly. Worth sampling, but a cautious 3/5 on my end.  Incentivized review after receiving as a free sample from Influenster. All opinions my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Getting my hands on Paco Rabanne's fresh scent early on has a certain thrill. But let's dive into the real deal:  The initial spritz echoes the familiar 1 Million sweetness, with a touch of vanilla or maybe cardamom. Then comes the exciting part: as it settles, there's this cool twist of smokiness and spice, all the while keeping that hint of sweetness intact. It's like a fragrance chameleon, fitting in whether you're hitting the club, going on a date, or just heading to school.  The bottle's pure Paco Rabanne u2013 sleek and shiny, with that little ruby gem stealing the show at the center.  On my skin, it sticks around for a solid 7-8 hours, projecting itself without being overbearing.  Overall, 1 Million Royal blends the best of the 1 Million series into a distinct profile that's intriguingly sweet and smoky. Definitely worth a shot if you're into fragrances that effortlessly switch things up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 1 Million Royal opens up with a blend of notes vying for your attention. The mandarin orange and bergamot citrus are sitting on top of the mix, giving this an initial lightness and brightness. Underneath, the warm spiciness of the cardamom and benzoin notes are already coming through.  Royal isnu2019t a heavy fragrance. Though, it has a lot more power than you think that it does. After wearing it for 3-4 hrs I can still smell it on me. At its peak, Royal is probably a 5-8 foot radius cologne, in terms of its projection. After that, itu2019s going to spend a ton of time in that 3-4 foot range. It lasted somewhere in the 8-8.5 hour range which is good enough for most uses. I have gotten a lots of complement on Royal and this one indeed feels like itu2019s going to have mass appeal.  Overall, royal is warmer and spicier. Performance is solid. Not a monster projector, but Royal does have a nice ability to project and leave a scent trail. Longevity is about what youu2019d need in most scenarios. I recommend giving this one a try, if youu2019re a fan of the 1 Million series!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing an honest review against receiving of this product, Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal is a warm and spicy fragrance that exudes luxury and masculinity. The opening bursts with fresh and zesty notes of mandarin and cardamom, which quickly transition to a heart of cinnamon, nutmeg, and woody notes. Finally, it settles into a warm and comforting base of cashmere wood and tobacco.   The fragrance has impressive longevity and projection that lasts well into the evening. It's the perfect choice for cold weather or formal gatherings, making one feel confident and elegant. The bottle design itself is also impressive, with its shiny, metallic finish and unique crown stopper, adding to the sophisticated and regal image of the fragrance.   While it may be on the pricier side, Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal is undoubtedly worth the investment as it's perfect for anyone who loves warm and spicy scents. Overall, it's an excellent choice for those who want to exude luxury and sophistication in their everyday lives.

For me a good cologne is subtle and appreciated when Iu2019m close quarters, not when you walk into a large room. For that reason, Iu2019d be unlikely to purchase this myself, but would recommend to someone who likes these scent notes and intensity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very fun fragrance perfect for summertime! This is a super fun scent - similar to the original tried and true scent! The woodsy notes bring some depth and the benzoin/sunscreen notes dry down beautifully! Itu2019s beautiful on its own but compliments and elevates other fragrances to the extreme!

reviews.review_title: A nice sweet fragrance for fall and winter
reviews.review_text: (I was sent this for free by Influenster for my honest review) My first impression when I first sprayed it on my hand was that it reminded me of my highshool days, as a lot of people wore the original 1 Million at my school. It seemed similar at first with the bubblegum sweetness, but after it dried down I was surprised by the smoky and nuttiness (kind of reminded me of By The FirePlace by Maison Margiela). Compared to the original 1 Million thats just full of sweetness and citrus, Royal adds in a bit of maturity while keeping a bit of the youthful sweetness. Because of the woody and smokiness, I would recommend using this during the cold weather, or for nights out.    It's definently not the most unique smelling scent, as I'm sure everyones smelled something similar to this out in public regularly. However, it is a scent thats safe and won't be offensive to anyone.  For longevity, it lasted a good 6-8 hours on my skin, and the projection didn't seem too bad either. I would occasionally get whiffs of it 6+ hours in.  For the bottle design, its very beautiful with the gem in the middle. It also has a very nice atomizer that sprays pretty wide.

reviews.review_title: A must have for all the men.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. My girl lives the smell of this perfume. I have got so many compliments for the scent. I really think men should go for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent journey this takes you on is complex and amazing would definitely recommend this cologne to everyone who loves a complex story line bravo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is gorgeous, a lot of details on it. The aroma is a bit intense for me but I can appreciate the subtlety of the notes. Bottom line I wouldn't purchase it for myself but if you have the right profile and like strong scents this is for you.

reviews.review_title: A must have in the rotation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past week or so I really loved it. Itu2019s a lighter version of the original. It has a medium lasting effect and definetly isnu2019t overpowering. It is definitely something Iu2019d wear on a night out

reviews.review_title: Very nice if you wanna smell good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very bold fresh scent, definitely one of my new favourites. I have found myself wearing this out and receiving complements and people asking what it is. Would definitely buy this again

reviews.review_title: A smell that will make head turns!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This men perfume brings masculine energy to another dimension. With tones of cedar, tangerine, lavande and much more, you cannot go wrong. I find this smell perfect for autumn and winter. Will be recommending it to family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to take a few days before writing my review so I could really sit with the scent and determine my thoughts. After a few days of wearing it Iu2019ve determined that itu2019s not for me. Not that itu2019s *bad*, just that I donu2019t love the scent, personally. The thing that is perhaps most impressive to me is its staying power; Iu2019ll put it on first thing in the morning after showering and even by 8pm itu2019s still noticeable. Itu2019s not *overpowering* though. Itu2019s nice to know that you wonu2019t have to re-apply this throughout the day. Thereu2019s a woodsiness that stays with you that is quite nice. Itu2019s got nice floral notes and a hint of sweetness. All that being said, it getu2019s the wife seal of approval! Sheu2019s very sensitive to scents and she didnu2019t find it overpowering, or worse, off putting. Itu2019s a good product, itu2019s just not the right product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cologne is really great. Itu2019s got a unique design and has a really light scent. This scent is not too manly yet not to feminine. Itu2019s just enough. Not quite sure what nodes Iu2019m picking up but itu2019s not too harsh and doesnu2019t smell overpowering or too aggressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate enough to receive this product for free from Influenster as part of an incentivized campaign. The scent is very refreshing and floral whilst also being masculine and sexy. Incredible silage and projection. Smells amazing on my husband. Fragrance lasts at least 6H on my husbands skin and makes me swoon. A real winner from Paco Rabanne!

reviews.review_title: Long lasting spicy,  sweet and woody perfume
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume. It is strong and long lasting. Has sweet, spicy and woody notes. The packaging is luxurious , look like a gold bar with a royal stamp imprint on it.
Really good cologne great for everyday wear! Received this complimentary via Influenster 5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very reminiscent of the og variation, leaves a spicy yet slightly sweet lavender after smell. VERY strong, definitely will last throughout the day - make sure not to spray too much as it can be a bit offensive. Beautiful packaging as always from Paco Rabanne, super happy to add this to my collection.

Iu2019ve had the opportunity to try out this fragrance for a couple weeks now and after wearing it daily, it safe to say Iu2019m hooked. Iu2019ve always been a fan of the original 1 Million, but this one takes the win for me. I really love the sweetness in the opening of this fragrance, I get a strong note of vanilla but it dries down to be much more subtle and woody. It lasts all day on my clothes, and a bit less on my skin but I think overall the longevity is great for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like sweet stuff, then choose Paco Rabanne, Its their specialty! Personally, 1 Spray of this and the whole room is doomed in flowers.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful bottle and refined version of 1Million
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fond memories of the original 1 Million and now as an adult, I am thankful to own this refined version of the Royal Parfum. Fans of Invictus and 1 Million lines will be pleased to know that this scent delicately threads the line between both of what makes them so great. This has a fresh tangerine opening and long lasting projection. Beautiful bottle as usual from Paco Rabanne, and will look good on any shelf!

1 Million Royal offre une fragrance ambree et chaudement epicee qui saura plaire aux fans du genre. Tres different du premier 1 Million de Paco Rabanne, c'est une reappropriation totale de la marque. C'est un parfum puissant, dont la tenue est longue et agreable, tout en gardant un sillage discret. Le packaging est beau, la bouteille, en forme de lingot d'or serti d'un rubis, est de tres bonne qualite et extru00eamement elegante. C'est un excellent produit que je recommande fortement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received the packaging, it looked very unique. I was not expecting it to be like a gold bar. It looks very rich. I love it! The woody smell that is not too overpowering is nice and the scent lasts a very long time. You do not even have to spray alot. A little goes a long way. It is an amazing product. #freesample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Paco Rabanne in exchange for my honest review and i absolutely love this cologne, it has to be one of my favourites. Opens sweet, similar to other's from the one million line. Once the dry down hit, you get a hint of wood. If you like the one million line then you will love this one. In my opinion this is the best fragrance for men,absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I find that it smells great. I would say it's a scent that's a mix of sweet and fresh with a hint of spice. Will definitely be purchasing this product.
Itu2019s fancy and captivating fragrance. It has a rich mix of spicy scents and warm woods that feel luxurious and leave a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: have worn this a couple time, itu2019s nothing mind blowing itu2019s a nice scent, in my opinion i think itu2019s one of the more mass appealing Paco Rabanne fragrances. the atomizer on mine was actually insane it sprayed really nicely i did appreciate the quality control on these new bottles. other than that yeah itu2019s a pleasant smell almost leaning more feminine/unisex but i still enjoy it!

reviews.review_title: Three sprays every every day lasts all day!
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this daily since receiving it and I love how long it lasts and the scent is perfect for me. Itu2019s hard to describe but itu2019s like it was made for me. It also lasts a very long time and I donu2019t have to reapply it throughout the day.   My wife loves it too ;).   Would buy again and again!

I actually really enjoy this cologne! I had originally wanted the original scent 1 million, but I enjoy the spicier scent 1 million royal exudes a lot more. Iu2019ve been wearing it daily ever since I received it and thoroughly really enjoy it. It lasts a long time and I find I can still smell it on my clothes all day. Iu2019d definitely recommend this if you like warmer notes in your cologne!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product starts off kinda sweet with a hint of vanilla and then smells very woody/spicy! The smells lasted most of my work day and started to fade about 6 hours after I applied it! I would suggest this to people who are looking for more of a more masculine scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had this fragrance for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it. Very strong and long lasting and the scent is rich and warm. This would be perfect for a night event, I got a ton of compliments when I wore this out.

reviews.review_title: A Subtle Take On The 1 Million DNA
reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanneu2019s 1 Million Royal Parfum is an interesting, yet divisive release for 2023. The top notes create a tame sweet and citrusy spiciness, with a slightly bitter undertone. The mid notes add a smooth, aromatic and floral aspect, that starts to balance out the scent. The woody and resinous base deepens the fragrance with a soft ambery warmth.   With it being a u201cparfumu201d concentration, I highly recommend testing it for yourself, because some reviewers claim the fragrance almost seems nonexistent, and others claim it has eternal longevity and projection. For a Paco Rabanne, the projection is lighter, but it also seems very easy to go anosmic to this one if you smell it too close. However, in the air, you really start to appreciate what this fragrance has to offer, and that it will still live up to being a 1 Million flanker.   This is probably the most mature release from the line. The 1 Million DNA is there, but it doesnu2019t come across as the loud, overly sweet, and somewhat obnoxious clubbing fragrance, that some people like. The overall performance is still great. Some people are getting 10+ hours, with low/moderate projection for around 5-6 hours. The projection may seem low to the person wearing it, but it leaves quite an amazing scent trail. Itu2019s not my favorite from the 1 Million line, but Paco Rabanne is known for releasing consistent, high-quality, mass-appealing and modern fragrances, and 1 Million Royal is no exception.

reviews.review_title: My new favorite ! Hands down the best scent..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had been selected by the Sephora in sponsorship with Influenster and Paco Rabanne to write my honest review after using the bottle of 50ml of complimentary 1 Million Royal Parfum. After using the Paco Rabanne 1 Million Royal Parfum I feel so confident as everyone keeps asking me about the parfum. I absolutely love this cologne, it has to be one of my favorites. I highly recommend this cologne to anyone who wants to smell great. Has a distinct sweet leathery smell which lasted pretty much the majority of the day. Dry down held onto the leathery smell which I was really hoping for. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 1 million royal parfum is shaped like that of a gold bar - giving it its prestigious  look. It has a mixture of scent (warm vanilla, citrusy , earthy note).The scent last a long time...but  changes  to a more muskier scent over time.   My first  impression of the fragrance  is that i feel this parfum  is more suitable for winter time. I personally dont think its suitable  for summer due to its strong earthy scent . When the temperature gets hot, it will make the air more stuffy.  But when i put it on a cold day, it makes me feel so secure and warm similar to having  a cup of hot chocolate to comfort me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this one for almost 2 weeks now and I can definitely say that its the best out of all 1Million fragrances released so far. It opens very fresh, has a tarty undertone to it which makes it easily wearable and inoffensive. I like the orange-ish smell in the opening slowly progressing towards the sweet 1Million DNA. Comes in the classic gold bar like presentation.  This is one more suited towards the younger crowd in my honest opinion but anyone can pull this off easily. Also, being a parfum concentration, it lasts throughout the day. Would definitely recommend picking this up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A must have. This is so different than any other Paco Rabanne perfume Iu2019ve owned. The woody notes add a lingering smell to the skin that gives off a pleasant smell. Amazing

reviews.review_title: Perfect blend of sweet and fresh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this perfume to test out and review and would like to say that I am impressed! itu2019s bold but cozy, powerful but soft and also sweet but fresh. This last about 8h on me and i got huge compliments wearing this out. Definitely would recommend!

Product received for free as part of a marketing campain  As a user of the new fragrance, I have to say I am impressed with both its longevity and sillage. The scent lasted all day and I received multiple compliments throughout the day. Even the next morning, I could still smell a faint trace of the fragrance.  What I love most about this fragrance is how versatile and easy it is to wear. It can be worn for a variety of occasions, from casual outings to more formal events. It's not overpowering, but it's noticeable enough to make an impression.  In fact, one of the most memorable moments was when a stunning woman in the Super C store line complimented me on the fragrance, exclaiming, OMG, you smell sooo good! It was a great confidence booster and I felt like a million bucks.  Overall, I highly recommend this fragrance for its longevity, sillage, and versatility. And if you're looking to turn heads and receive compliments, this is the scent for you

reviews.review_title: Long lasting and intense male fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed its staying power compared to the original 1 Million fragrance. It lasts throughout the day and has a very approachable and masculine scent that is bond to turn heads wherever you are while wearing it. Overall, I feel like it's just a welcome step up from the original version that I'm already familiar with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to try and it's probably the most intense fragrance they have out, even moreso than the recent Invictus release. One spray is very strong and the notes of lavender and cedarwood surprisingly blend well despite them both being very distinct and overpowering in most cases. the benzoin gives off vanilla notes. Overall it's great but I still love the OG 1 million. Great gift for those who love strong scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cologne was incentivized by influenster.   Starting of with the bottle, sleek gold og one million look with red in the centre. The button/nozzle is a bit stiff so there is no good way to spray just a little. Youu2019ll get a full spray regardless.   The fragrance starts with a warm cardamom and bergamot smell. As it wears off there is a smell of citrusy tangerine with a hint of lavender.  Definitely something to wear in the winter as it has a nice, warm and spicy smell.  As far as longevity goes, it lasted 7-8 hours on bare skin. The smell was present the next day on the clothes.

reviews.review_title: A Scent Fit For A King
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review)   As a fan of the original 1 Million fragrance I was excited to get to try this new take and the brand has definitely grown up. With its woodsy smells of cedar mixed with a hint of Lavender and Benzoin oil this regal cologne is sure to be a hit at your next jousting match or giant royal wedding!   Long lasting I would definitely recommend this if you can find it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing smelling perfume, it smells like someone who just took a shower, you smell clean. The bottle is very unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Made in France, it has a conscious vegan formula. This is sweet, woody and spicy fragrance that is settle at first but becomes fully powered with time. Itu2019s long-lasting with three sprays on your body lasting up to 8 hours and on your clothing, it lasts up to 10 hours. It projects up to 4 feet. Perfect for a luxurious evening out or date night, it is a great intimate scent which opens with a mandarin, bergamot and green cardamon scent. As it dries down, that scent turns into a lavender, sage and violet. It smells better after it sets in your skin. Itu2019s sweet and sexy. The presentation, it looks like a gold bar with a ruby in the front without viewing it as tacky. Is it a bit loud? Yes. A bit youthful? Yes. Aimed at the masses? Yes. The One Million is a guilty pleasure of mine and itu2019s the biggest best-selling menu2019s fragrances of all time. You cannot deny that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression, the bottle was very interesting but I found the unique bottle style comfortable to use. Scent wise, I found it a tad overwhelming my first use, but I tried lighter and more dispersed usage and was pleased with the change. I received multiple compliments whilst wearing this on the new cologne/purfum. I would recommend to others! This was recieved as part of an ad campaign.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 1 Million Royal is a warm and cozy, sweet, aromatic fragrance that has strong projection and decent longevity. Like the other releases in the line, 1 Million Royal is a great date night or evening fragrance that shines during the fall and winter months. This fragrance leans younger but honestly anyone can pull it off. 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster to write an honest review about it. The smell is amazingly strong sweet with a hint of vanilla (good strong) which I think makes it perfect for formal night parties. It's kind of a perfume which gives you an effect of freshness and it is very long lasting, I've tested how long the smell would last and I can say for sure that it lasted for good 4 hours just like you used it few minutes ago, which I liked most about it, so you don't have to refresh its smell for the longest time after minimum use which will make the bottle last for a while. The bottle is designed like a big gold brick which is very unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent overall. Iu2019m really impressed with how little you need to last you the entire day. Iu2019d definitely recommend this product to my peers. Iu2019ve never smelt better. 5/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Id say this is by far my favourite from the million line/flankers. Its not overly sweet, its elegant and its really good in my opinion. Another date night fragrance for sure !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all i love the package it actually looks Royal. It is one of the best warm woody amber perfume i tried in a long time, it has little twist to the regular 1 million perfume You can easily smell amber wood and bergamot in it It stays for like 12 good long lasting fragrance Recommended got this product for free from influenster in exchange of my honest review

reviews.review_title: Captivating Blend: A Darker Twist on 1 Million
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance has an interesting note breakdown including cardamom, benzoin, lavender, violet, clary sage, and tangerine, giving it a warm, slightly sweet, and citrusy aroma. The original 1 Million fragrance was known for its sweetness, but this one takes a darker turn, similar to 1 Million Elixir and Emporio Armani's Stronger With You. The nutty vibe from the original is present in this fragrance, with noticeable aromatic notes and a pleasant dose of cardamom. Overall, it's a nice scent that's worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Spicy, sweet, woodsy, and powdery;  not a super masculine fragrance, could definitely pass as a unisex smell. Has a strong vanilla/tonka type of perspective (in my opinion), which is not something I personally gravitate towards. Def a scent for cooler weather. Decent longevity.

reviews.review_title: FamilIar fragrance with an interesting twist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One Million Royal is a new fragrance by Paco Rabanne that puts a new spin on the original One Million DNA. The fragrance opens with a smooth sweetness that has mild cardamon and vanilla notes. It then evolves into a musky radiant scent that smells of benzoin and amber. After a few hours the fragrance is reduced to a skin scent that smells lovely and luxurious.   The fragrance has a large amount of projection and will last 10-12 hours. It even lasts after taking a shower which is quite impressive.   Overall Iu2019d recommend this fragrance to anyone who is a fan of the One Million line. It is a great option for the price.   I received a bottle of this fragrance from Influenster in exchange for this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have been trying this for a few days. Long lasting. Strong sweet and woody fragrance. I would use this as a winter fragrance. To me it smells like a unisex fragrance but they do make a ladies version. If you spray too much it can be overpowering. If you like original 1 Million you will like this!

reviews.review_title: A scent that will get you noticed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the design of the bottle is remarkable; it's covered in gold, shaped like an ingot, and the front is adorned with a giant red ruby logo. It definitely lives up to its name. The scent is undeniably an attention grabber, thanks to the warm spicy amber and woody accords. With this scent, a little goes a long way, that is to say, one spray is very strong and will last the whole day if not more. The initial spicy woody scent blends into a mild and very fragrant vanilla, lavender, and sage mix. Overall it is a very nice smelling scent,one that will get you noticed wherever you go.

reviews.review_title: Nice, but strong, only need 1 or 2 squirts.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in return for my review, the 1 Million Royal is a really nice parfum,  it's really hard to put my finger right on it but it is a good smelling spray. I really enjoyed it, check out the profile on Fragrantica to get a proper full description. I really liked it, I like things like Sauvage, Tobacco Vanille, Versace Pour Homme, not similar but those are the kinds I like if that gives a better idea.
